title: TEST: Verify field mapping fix works correctly
description: Test entry to verify that the field mapping fix works correctly and all fields like businessContext and technicalContext are properly preserved in the devlog structure.

context.businessContext: This is a test to verify that the businessContext field is properly saved in the context object structure
context.technicalContext: This tests that the WorkspaceDevlogManager.createDevlog method now properly maps businessContext and technicalContext into the context object structure instead of losing them
